title: Confirm Media Wall Panel is present on the page
custom_expected: THEN the media wall components (video/image, kicker header and text of the blurb) will be displayed on the page

title: Confirm Media Wall blurb is present
custom_expected: THEN media wall blurb is present/displayed on the page

title: Confirm Media Wall Panel kicker is present
custom_expected: THEN media wall panel kicker is present/displayed on the page

title: Confirm Media Wall kicker/header content corresponds to the cms file content
custom_expected: THEN content of the media wall kicker's content is the same  as in the corresponding cms file under items->title

title: Confirm Media Wall blurb/summary paragraph content corresponds to cms file
custom_expected: THEN content displayed in the media wall blurb corresponds to the expected blurb content in corresponding cms file under items->fields->blurb

title: Confirm Media Wall media type (image or video) corresponds to the content of the cms file
custom_expected: THEN media wall content (Image or Video) corresponds to the media wall content in cms file.

title: Confirm Media Wall text links redirect urls
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page and clicking on each of the media wall's kicker and blurb's links
custom_expected: THEN page redirects to same url as in the corresponding cms under: for kicker's title links - items->fields->url, for blurb's paragraph's links - items->blurb->text in (http:...) and for blurb's 'more' link - items->fields->url.

title: Confirm Media Wall Image redirect url
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page if image is expected media type and image is displayed
custom_expected: THEN clicking on media wall panel image redirects to the same url as in corresponding cms file under items->fields->url

title: Confirm if the Video is present it has play button and video lazy image is loaded
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page and expected media content is video
custom_expected: THEN overlay lazy image for the video is loaded and a play button is displayed in the bottom left corner of the media wall video overlay image.

title: Confirm Media Wall Video Image redirect url
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page if video is expected media type and video overlay image is displayed
custom_expected: THEN clicking on media wall panel video overlay image redirects to the same url as in corresponding cms file under items->fields->url.

title: Confirm Mixed Feed is present
custom_expected: THEN the mixed feed components (images, headers) will be displayed on the page

title: Confirm Mixed Feed has right media content type
custom_expected: THEN the type of media displayed on the page is the same as specified in the mixed feed's cms file

title: Confirm presence of media(video, cut4, news)
custom_expected: THEN the mixed feed will contain at least one of the expected media types (cut4, video, articles) that corresponds to cms file.

title: Confirm if videos are present, clicking on them redirects to expected urls
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page AND there are videos in the mixed feed
custom_expected: THEN clicking on the videos redirects to expected urls taken from cms file

title: Confirm Mixed Feed body headers/links are redirecting to expected urls
custom_expected: THEN the body headers of the mixed feed items are redirecting to expected urls confirmed against cms file

title: Confirm Images are redirecting to expected urls
custom_expected: THEN clicking on the images redirects to urls that match urls in the corresponding cms file.

title: Confirm content of the feature content header
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page AND there are videos and blog-content (cut4)in the mixed feed
custom_expected: THEN the items that contain videos have a feature content header "VIDEO" and items with blog content have a feature content header  "CUT 4"

title: Confirm body headers' content
custom_expected: THEN all headers in the mixed feed items' body are matching the corresponding content from cms file

title: Confirm the mixed feed bodies' content
custom_steps: WHEN reviewing the page AND if mixed feed item contains a summary
custom_expected: THEN summary's content matches its corresponding content from cms file

title: Confirm presence of the component
custom_expected: THEN Headline Stack/Latest News component is present on the page.

title: Confirm presence of at least one article in the component
custom_expected: THEN Headline Stack/Latest News has/displays at least one article.

title: Confirm  articles headlines content
custom_expected: THEN headlines' content on the web matches headlines content taken from cms file independent of the order headlines are displayed on the page.

title: Confirm headlines redirect urls
custom_expected: THEN after clicking on a headline the redirected url matches the corresponding url from csm file.

title: Confirms headlines content and order in which they are displayed
custom_expected: THEN headlines content and order in which they are displayed matches the corresponding cms file.

title: Confirm the Header contains 'Latest News'
custom_expected: THEN one of the component's headers is "Latest News"

title: Confirm the number and content of headers
custom_expected: THEN number and order of the main headers displayed on the page corresponds to the cms data.

logo clicks through to https://www.mlb.com/

custom_expected: THEN "MLB.com | The Official Site of Major League Baseball" is displayed at the top of the page

title: Confirm presence
custom_expected: THEN "League Leaders" is displayed on the page

title: Confirm headshot presence
custom_expected: THEN "Team Leader" players are displaying headshots

title: Confirm batting/pitching toggle
custom_expected:
THEN the data changes as expected between batting stats (ex: AVG/HR/RBI/SB) or pitching stats (W/SV/SO)

Note: Displayed stat values may change

title: Confirm Batting tab only displays position players (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P)
custom_expected: THEN only positions (1B, 2B, 3B, SS, C, LF, RF, CF, DH, P) are displayed

title: Confirm Pitching tab only displays pitchers (P)
custom_expected: THEN only position (P) is displayed
